description: Davenport-Schinzel numbers of degree n on 4 symbols.
references: R. K. Guy, Unsolved Problems in Number Theory, E20.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
R. G. Stanton and P. H. Dirksen, Davenport-Schinzel sequences, Ars. Combin., 1 (1976), 43-51.
links: R. G. Stanton and P. H. Dirksen, Davenport-Schinzel sequences, Ars. Combin., 1 (1976), 43-51. [Annotated scanned copy]
formula: For n > 4, a(2*n) = 12 * n - 13 and a(2*n+1) = 12 * n - 14. - _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 19 2016
crossrefs: A row of the array in A259874.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
extensions: Title improved and more terms from _Sean A. Irvine_, Feb 19 2016
